answers.answer: Hi,It is quite possible that you are suffering from peripheral neuropathy. This could be due to traumatic nerve damage as a result of surgery.Other possibilities include metabolic diseases like diabetes, thyroid dysfunction and B12 deficiency.This requires further evaluation and neurological tests. Please consult your GP and let us know if you have any more questions.
